website_summaries.verdict: A large rack that conveniently attaches to the door or wall, ideal for large households with lots of canned goods.
pros: Comes with 8 adjustable shelves so you can store cans of any height
Rack can be used as 1 long unit, or split into 2 smaller units
Installation is quick and easy: hang rack over the door or mount to the wall
Also includes bottom hooks to prevent rack from swinging
Durable rack can withstand plenty of weight
cons: Hooks have an adhesive tape that wears off over time but, tape doesn't affect overall usefulness

customer_reviews.title: Quality Space Saver
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy storage - holds WAY more items than I expected. Freed up two large shelves in the food pantry. Originally purchased to organize spices but was able to fit many other items as well. Comes with everything you need. I purchased command hooks separately after reading reviews recommending them, but the pantry shelf itself comes with four self adhesive hooks to keep unit from moving. Didn't even need to buy the hooks. All in all it's a great purchase - only wish I bought it sooner!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely hated this. I posted pictures of the one I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t reach from the top of the door to the bottom. It doesn’t align well. It was crooked no matter which way I adjusted. I’m going to post a picture of the one I highly recommend to all of you. It is better quality and it hangs from the top to the bottom of the door. You don’t need any screws in your door. The package was beat to shreds.
customer_reviews.author: Jojo

customer_reviews.title: Really easy to out together.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this rack. I was weary of putting it together. I am 81 years old and sometimes the printed instructions confuse me. I waited 2 weeks to try to do it. I should not have waited. I had it up and filled with pantry items in 25 minutes It is much more sturdy then one I had 20 years ago.
customer_reviews.author: jennine quiring

customer_reviews.title: This thing was simple to put together and I mounted ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing was simple to put together and I mounted it over the door with the included stability hooks. It has greatly improved my pantry organizational capacity! It does make your door very heavy though- so be sure your door and hinges can handle all the extra weight. Note- the shallow racks are supposed to go with the support bars. The deep racks don't get support bars. I figured this out AFTER putting it together wrong first...
customer_reviews.author: Emily E. Jefferys

customer_reviews.title: Much better than other reviews state
customer_reviews.text: When I checked the other reviews, I thought this item had a good chance of being junk, missing pieces, and difficult to assemble. I put it together by myself and hung it on the pantry door by myself in less than 45 minutes. I am impressed with the cleverness of the engineers who designed it and the precision of the parts. My wife now thinks I'm a genius because I made sure she read the other reviews. Take your time, read the directions thoroughly and use the proper tools- then you'll be a genius tool
customer_reviews.author: Uncle Willie

customer_reviews.title: This is perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: No surprises here: this is exactly as advertised and precisely what I needed so I can see what we have in the spice rack and pantry. Now I won't be duplicating items on the back of the shelf, and since everything is so visible I'm finding it easier and less stressful to decide what to make for meals. My grandsons (9 and 7) and I put this together in less than 30 minutes without a single tear or bleeped word. I'm thinking I may need to order another one to hang in the workshop to organize jars of nails, screws, bolts and nuts, bottles of motor oil and cans of lawn equipment fuel, small cans of paint, and the like.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie G

customer_reviews.title: easy to install
customer_reviews.text: these were easy and didn't take long to install. very happy with the product and additional shelf space.
customer_reviews.author: powerfoot

customer_reviews.title: Great space saver and looks nice too!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, looks great, and is a good space saver. I put mine on my kitchen door. It’s perfect for extra storage space for things in my kitchen. The only thing I don’t like is that it’s not sturdy enough. It’s too wobbly when I move my door. What I personally wish it had was another set of holes down the middle of the tracks to drive screws through into the door. That would keep the tracks completely stuck to the door so they can’t protrude away from the door and bend left or right. Other than that... this is a awesome buy!
customer_reviews.author: Roxvox77

customer_reviews.title: Well made and easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: As with most anything dealing with kitchens you find yourself at that point where you have more stuff than cabinet space. That is where this spice and jar rack came into play. I'd been pushing spices, condiments, and other things in jars to the back of my pantry and forgetting about them to later find out I already had purchased them multiple times before because I forgot that I had them. I purchased this item to make sure it wouldn't happen anymore. Putting it together was a snap and then with the help/hinderance of my young children, we loaded the spice rack full of spices and condiments (in multiple) so hopefully we'll never repurchase something we already have five of.
customer_reviews.author: Lane Holloway

customer_reviews.title: Screw didn’t fit
customer_reviews.text: I received the item in a timely fashion but immediately tried to put it together and one of the screws was either too big or wouldn’t grip. I tried to contact the seller for a replacement screw and haven’t heard anything. It’s frustrating because it’s exactly what I want and need but it isn’t functional and I am disappointed I haven’t received a response to my inquiry. I hate to rate the product so poorly but I had to.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Make sure the inside of door is flat and there is not a handle to block installation.
customer_reviews.text: Not quite as simple as described. The hook that hangs over your door is to narrow. It would not fit over our pantry door. After putting the two pieces together I figured out that the door handle was in the way of the now one piece rack. If you have a door handle make sure you keep the pieces separated and install separately. The rack seems sturdy and well built. Still have not installed as I will need help measuring, leveling and holding pieces. It would be nice if the instructions would tell you what width the braces should be so the shelves will fit correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Aldo

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to Assemble
customer_reviews.text: The instructions are on the outside of the box instead of a nice sheet you can use for reference. There were parts missing so I am returning the item. Unfortunately the company also expects me to pay for the return postage after already paying for postage originally. I feel this is not something they should do given the circumstances. I'm sorry if they didn't like my first review and would not post it. Censorship.
customer_reviews.author: Debra  Sterns

customer_reviews.title: This is a great storage addition and its very practical
customer_reviews.text: This is a great storage addition and its very practical. Set up was pretty easy until it was time to hang it over the door. I used the hooks that came with the hardware and it was a complete FAIL everything came tumbling to the ground like a domino effect. I had to go to home depot to find a solution to secure it to the door to keep it from swinging crazy glue did not work as suggested by some reviewers. Alas I found some cable wood staples that worked wonders. I've attached some pics and hopefully it can help some peeps in the future. Other than that this is a pretty good item to have for additional storage.
customer_reviews.author: BelleCaze

customer_reviews.title: Easy and gives you more storage
customer_reviews.text: Looking for more storage for a small closet pantry and didn't have much op. on the shelves. Had wire shelving so looked to the back of the door opt. This one yes is a bit pricey but I wanted to make sure that it would last and not break; so the metal opt was one key selling pt. Also that the shelves were adjustable I could make them what ever height I needed. You will need a power tool to help with attaching the screws. The metal was a bit hard to get the screws by hand. Went up really fast and now I have so much more room to store my food.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Dittmer

customer_reviews.title: Manufacturing defect --one shelf too narrow to install due to spot-welding defects at both ends
customer_reviews.text: One of the shelves is useless because it cannot be inserted into the two upright brackets on either side--this is due to imprecise alignment during welding of the lower rod that should fit into the slot. I need the manufacturer to send me a replacement shelf that will fit, as the other shelves do!
customer_reviews.author: hummingbird

customer_reviews.title: Does the job. Lots of baskets.
customer_reviews.text: A bit flimsy. The supports don't really hold this to the door. Baskets allow items to fall thru from the sides. The upper hooks make closing a little stiff, but does close. Needs a couple of more holes and screws to secure to a door. Other than that, pretty happy for the price. I used heavy duty hook and loop tape to secure it in more places.
customer_reviews.author: movin and groovin

customer_reviews.title: JUST WHAT I NEEDED!!!
customer_reviews.text: I added so much storage area to my pantry!! But unless you are a pretty handy woman, you may need a handy husband or friend with a drill to mount it to your door! We faced an issue with the doorknob being in the way, so when measuring to see if it will fit on your door, make sure the brackets will fit without interference of the doorknob! My hubby is very handy so he was able to cut out a little notch there. But much easier to install if you can avoid that! But I really love it and the way you can adjust the shelves to fit your needs!
customer_reviews.author: rebecpon

customer_reviews.title: The holes are too small for the provided screws
customer_reviews.text: The holes are too small for the provided screws, so I can’t put the rack together. So disappointed and also it won’t fit the door on my pantry ... it’s too Big for the door. Don’t assume it will fit, recommend measuring your door. Only if you’re able and have the equipment to do additional drilling on the holes on the metal rails to make them wider, I don’t recommended this at all. Poorly made, very disappointed. I will have to search for another solution. I’m confused on the positive reviews this received.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli

customer_reviews.title: Created extra storage in small pantry
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. I have a small pantry and everything was stacked on top of the other, I couldn't get to anything outwithout stuff falling all the time. This shelf has been exactly what I needed, it gives extra storage and the shelves give a good option to secure small and large containers. I am now able to arrange everything without it looking messy or falling out. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: SK

customer_reviews.title: Great pantry organizer.
customer_reviews.text: This organizer has made a big difference in my pantry. It has freed up shelf space for other items and made locating spices and similar items much easier. I used to knock spices in the floor trying to reach behind for others. This is no longer a probem. It hangs on the door and looks great and neatly organized when the door is open. I would definitely purchase again if I had a place for another one.
customer_reviews.author: Treva Millarr

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: Great addition to the pantry! We anchored it to the outside of our pantry door right beside the stove. It is full of spices, oils, and cooking liquids. Love the adjustable shelves. The piece is sturdy and well built. Really appreciate that the connector between the bars is solid and not a flimsy piece like other shelves sold on Amazon. It is the main reason we chose this shelf.
customer_reviews.author: Crabby Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my pantry door
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for! This is sturdy and can be adjusted many ways to meet any storage need. Comes with anchors if you dont want to screw it into the door. I screwed mine directly to the door because I plan on replacing that door anyway. I'll use the anchors on my new door. It does not clatter or shake when the door opens or closes. It holds more than I expected. I am very happy with this. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Supplied more storage
customer_reviews.text: I bought this rack as I attempted to do my COVID-19 kitchen organizing! It did not disappoint and gave me so much more room in my pantry that I had before. It’s a big thumbs up. I assembled it in place which made it much easier than trying to assemble it and then putting it on the door. I have had to reinforce it with some additional acrylic tape to hold it fast. to the door
customer_reviews.author: MoMo

customer_reviews.title: This was a pain in the butt to put together ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a pain in the butt to put together and then after it was, it did not set flush against the pantry door. It hung in a warped sort of manner. We purchased 3M hooks to hold it down and with the addition of about 7 of them it now stays snug against the door. The hooks supplied in the product were next to worthless.
customer_reviews.author: kbs

customer_reviews.title: Complete Trash....a Total Waste of Both Money and Time
customer_reviews.text: Bad spotwelds on shelves. Installation hardware of incredibly poor quality and design. My first instinct on seeing it "right out of the box" was to transit it immediately into my trash can, but I decided to persevere. Unfortunately, that instinct was right, and it ended up in the trash anyway, but only after much frustration at how poor it actually was.
customer_reviews.author: Wonder Warthog

customer_reviews.title: Great storage shelving
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to put together. Fits the pantry door perfectly. Holds a lot. Very pleased. After having this installed for several days I have to change this review. It keeps falling off and everything falls on the floor. This has happened four times in two days. It is now being held together with over 30 twist ties. If I hadn’t thrown the box away I would return it. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Arnoldysa

customer_reviews.title: Quite nice
customer_reviews.text: The shelf is sturdy and deep enough to use, even to put bottles on them. It has a very nice natural incline to the wall/door so bottles could lean on the wall/door. But mounting them on the wall is a little bit of trouble. It is not too easy to make sure the two rails are parallel and separated by a perfect distance. Plus the shelves only hang on the rails, instead of nailed to it. Sometimes I feel insecure about it. But that had not been a problem for the time I’ve been using it.
customer_reviews.author: zyt329

customer_reviews.title: low price alternative to name brand
customer_reviews.text: I needed more pantry storage and this product is slightly wider and shallower than the name brand alternative. It fit together well and is sturdily holding everything I put in it. The spacing on the wire shelves is a bit wide for small spice bottles (they fall over) but it's been great for dry goods and larger containers.
customer_reviews.author: Henry E. Bangsberg

customer_reviews.title: Great additional storage!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this unit to turn the back of my pantry door into an enormous spice rack. I had to add a few screws on each side to add to the support, but other than that, I'm extremely pleased with my purchase. This well-made rack has pieces that allow you to store taller items without worrying that they will fly off the shelf when you open and close the door.
customer_reviews.author: Dolly

customer_reviews.title: Great for a small apartment.
customer_reviews.text: I have very little storage in my kitchen, so I got this to put in the front coat closet. Works great and holds a ton. The only downer was the additional support hooks (not the main top ones) didn’t support much, so I did screw the bottom into my door to keep it stable. Not the worst thing, but would have preferred not to.
customer_reviews.author: JessL

customer_reviews.title: Had to repair it to install it.
customer_reviews.text: Honestly I paid allot for something I had to fix just to be able to install. The hardware wasn’t correct and I ended up drilling and buying different nuts and bolts to make it all work. So be warned and prepared to modify and fix this.
customer_reviews.author: Just a guy

customer_reviews.title: Just what we needed
customer_reviews.text: We attached the rails to the door instead of using the over-the-door hangers. We really like this rack - it fit everything we needed it to. I wish the shelves were not as deep so I could store my spices in a single row.
customer_reviews.author: BoilerCES

customer_reviews.title: Door hung pantry addition.
customer_reviews.text: The adhesive "hooks" supplied to stop swinging when opening the door are useless. I used two small screws to attach the assembly directly to the door.
customer_reviews.author: James Brediger

customer_reviews.title: The sticky fasteners failed
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product, easy to install, holds lots of stuff. BUT, THE STICKY FASTENERS FAIL OVER TIME. So now, the unit bangs against the door whenever you open it. PLEASE HAVE THE MANUFACTURER SEND ME REPLACEMENT STICKY FASTENERS. I would give this product five stars if the sticky fasteners would actually work to hold the unit tight against the door.
customer_reviews.author: James Moore

customer_reviews.title: Great Space Saver
customer_reviews.text: I was tired of searching for canned goods in my upper cabinets because I couldn't see what was what. So I am using this rack for canned goods and can see everything and know what i have in stock. Installed it in my laundry room by my kitchen. Its perfect for my needs!
customer_reviews.author: heyjude

customer_reviews.title: Great for storage and easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: We do not have a pantry so we use our laundry room (near our kitchen) for lots of storage. This has doubled our space for food storage. Took about 20 minutes to install and is easily adjusted. Its very durable and holds a lot of canned goods, pastas, and other pantry items.
customer_reviews.author: Valente

customer_reviews.title: Perfect no drill organizer
customer_reviews.text: This organizer is FANTASTIC! It is all nicely coated metal and not plastic like others. Very easy to put together. The best part is after you hang it from the top of the door you don’t have to drill holes in your expensive doors because it has “no swing clips” they hold it in place! I love this item!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: More durable than I had anticipated
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised at the quality and durability of this product. I would highly recommend this item to anyone who has a small space and needs additional storage. I use it for my towels in the bathroom. I hung it over the door and rolled up my towels . They fit nicely! And it looks neat and tidy. I also was surprised by how many racks there are. I had a couple of unused ones, which I now use to store toiletries!
customer_reviews.author: REBECCA MADRIGAL

customer_reviews.title: Very secure hooked .on door
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic storage unit to finish off our pantry items. From bottom (laundry products) to top (larger cannisters, flour, sugar,etc) and wine, oil, and many canned products . Fit our needs perfectly!!! Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: TRS

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, hooks don't hold
customer_reviews.text: It looks good on the inside of the pantry door but the hooks that were supposed to stick to the door, did't. Have to think of another solution because now it's hanging and swinging back and forth every time I open the pantry door.
customer_reviews.author: Irina Georgieva

customer_reviews.title: Cheap material
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't even put it together because the screw wouldn't fit through the hole and I ended up just stripping the screw and there's not extras so now I can't even put the piece of crap together. Very cheap flimsy material.
customer_reviews.author: Elisha

customer_reviews.title: Be sure to read the fine print
customer_reviews.text: Rack worked great I was under the impression that I was getting multiple racks but it was only two racks combined to make one my mistake I myself would not have paid that much for just one but I did not want to mess with The hassle of sending it back
customer_reviews.author: Vegas Ken F

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed for increasing storage in a small space!
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with product. Only one minor issue: There are two parts to adhere to the bottom of the shelf unit and door so the shelving doesn't bounce when you open/close the door. The adhesive didn't last more than a few days. Other than that, I'm thinking of buying another one for a different door as it's great to organize.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: We love it
customer_reviews.text: We loved it so much we got another one. Perfect for a spice rack, medicine cabinet and pantry storage of any kind. Well made and very useful for organizing. We used the sticky hooks not the screws
customer_reviews.author: Mommy

customer_reviews.title: Not awful for the price
customer_reviews.text: Overall, it is what it is - an over the door storage piece. When I was installing it, I noticed some of the baskets were bent and didn't lay flat/straight on the two long door pieces. Some of the wires on the baskets were loose. Definitely could be better quality for what you're using it for!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie R

customer_reviews.title: Nice extra pantry space
customer_reviews.text: Overall the rack fits very well on the wall of my pantry. The hardware that comes in the box is mainly for door installation and I think it would work very well. The mollies for wall installation were terrible. I bought better quality at the hardware store and then had no problem. The wire shelves were not difficult to install and really make the pantry more organized and easier to find what you are looking for. Over all a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: jb

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for standard pantry door (single). Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Product is as described and shown. I haven't bolted it to my pantry door, just hung it from the door and does great to store spices and cereal and anything else you want. Product finish is great and assembly is very easy; comes with all necessary hardware and the hardware packaging is great. Wife loves it and I would recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: Kiran Rao

customer_reviews.title: Space Saver
customer_reviews.text: It freed up space in our tiny pantry. I had to have a bit of help assembling it, but once the shelves were in they seem to stay in place well and not budge. They have been great since we are so limited on space.
customer_reviews.author: Autu5300

customer_reviews.title: I wish I had bought sooner
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice shelf kit to fit into a smaller space like a pantry. I did not mount mine on the back of the door. I used the hardware included to attach it to the wall. I'l probably buy another one. Shelves seem sturdy. The rack is nice and clean. it's a winner.
customer_reviews.author: H2K

customer_reviews.title: Use screws to install
customer_reviews.text: This is a great organizing unit. One major issue, the double sided tape included are garbage and not capable for any real use. I used the hooks over door and screws at the bottom to hold it secure.
customer_reviews.author: Landon

customer_reviews.title: Lots of space
customer_reviews.text: The shelves hold a lot of items. I put it over my pantry door and it freed up an entire cabinet. The only thing I don't like is that the middle doesn't secure well against the door (when the two pieces are used to make a full door set up.) I can't put a screw in the door to secure it.
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: Great product, too much packaging
customer_reviews.text: I love it. The unit is sturdy and helps free up space in my closet, which is awesome! I would buy this again for another closet. It's great for my tiny apartment. Shipping was fast too. The only thing I didn't like was that each shelf was in it's own plastic bag. I wish they could have been more eco friendly with the shipping materials, I feel guilty putting all that unnecessary plastic straight into the landfill.
customer_reviews.author: Tina R

customer_reviews.title: Great Organizer
customer_reviews.text: A gift for our daughter and her husband who had nothing but a drawer to put their spices in. Imagine trying to find the right spice with umpteen bottles that you can't read the labels on. They are thrilled with the over the door spice rack. It not only gives them more than enough room for their spices but also handles the overload from their pantry. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Unknown

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded expectations
customer_reviews.text: The installation went smoothly but we were not sure how much space it would add vs the soft "shoe type" hanger we were using. We discovered it held a lot more and has a much nicer appearance
customer_reviews.author: James Hutchinson

customer_reviews.title: GREAT item
customer_reviews.text: I love my rack as I call it. It is everything they said it was. I put mine over the door. I use mine as a ribbon holder. In fact I’m thing about ordering another one.
customer_reviews.author: mammies crafts

customer_reviews.title: Gives me so much room
customer_reviews.text: OMG! I just increased the size of my pantry with this shelving system. Fits over the door and hangs on the inside of the pantry. I use it for lighter things like all my spices, croutons, tea bags, etc. Now I can find things easier in my pantry and on the door. Allows for better organization.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbie

customer_reviews.title: A five star experience
customer_reviews.text: Expertly packaged and arrived before estimated arrival time. Mounted easily to inside pantry door with screws with plenty of room for storing food items and sheet pans. Thinking about buying another from this seller! Sturdy quality construction. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Snowkatt

customer_reviews.title: Best wire shelves I have ever purchased
customer_reviews.text: These are as good as all the other reviews said. I still have not fully filled them up. My favorite thing is that they are adjustable, so I can change height when I purchase different items. Held so much that I, not only put all my pantry stuff back in it, I put tools, cat food, everything. They don't budge either. To save money, I purchased two pre-open boxes and they work fine.
customer_reviews.author: Charla L. Malone

customer_reviews.title: This a great product with a few personal cliches
customer_reviews.text: Overall the product is great and does just what I wanted it to do it is very durable and structured well. I gave it a 4 only because I had hoped the wire baskets also had a back to prevent bottles from marring the door it is hung on. also this product has to be screwed into the door. The tape on holders are not strong enough and held the product down for less than a day.
customer_reviews.author: Rose Mary Gaspari

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy this thing. I read the reviews that said this unit swings away from the door, but I figured I could just add some more command hooks. However, when you construct it as one long until (instead of two short ones), it bows in the middle and pulls the command hooks away from the door (along with the door’s paint). My return window just closed, so this thing is headed to the garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Lots of shelf space
customer_reviews.text: I installed this unit on the back of my pantry door and it added a lot of storage space. I would have liked the shelves to be about 1" deeper because a lot of things like OXO canisters won't fit.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Danim

customer_reviews.title: This product is amazing for space saving and organization within your pantry.
customer_reviews.text: We have enjoyed our new spice rack, which helped a great deal with cabinet re-organization. The important thing to remember is to secure this product directly to the door to prevent spices or stored items to slip through the back. We are very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Donofrio

customer_reviews.title: I couldn't be happier with this spice rack
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't be happier with this spice rack!! I needed something simple for my spices and a few extra items that kept tipping over in my pantry due to the shelves being wire racks. It fit perfectly over my pantry door and gave me 8 extra shelves of storage. All my oil, canned goods and baking goods fit perfectly! Easy to assemble and great value for your money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Missing Screws
customer_reviews.text: Just received the Home Complete pantry door organizer, today, 2-3-19, and it is missing 2 screws and nuts to hang on the bottom of the rail. 4 screws with nuts are used to join the rails together, 2 are used with nuts to put the top rail hooks on, but NO SCREWS AND NUTS for the bottom hooks!!
customer_reviews.author: Helen M.

customer_reviews.title: Bad hardware good product
customer_reviews.text: Good product however the nut and bolts that connect to two brackets stripped out when i hand tightend them. Otherwise no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Freeland

customer_reviews.title: Works amazing. Wish we weren’t renting
customer_reviews.text: Works amazing. Wish we weren’t renting, I could bump this up to five stars if I could drill through the door. The sticky hooks they provide aren’t strong enough. Needed to add duct tape (temporary) until I can get stronger sticky hooks. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Robert D Davis

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Shelves
customer_reviews.text: The shelves went together easily and fit over my pantry door. I like the shelves very much as it gives me so much more room in my pantry. The door is a lot heavier now and shuts a bit harder. Overall I'm very happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: colorado sunrise

customer_reviews.title: Hooks don't work
customer_reviews.text: The hooks that came with it do not keep it from swinging. They do not stick good. It would have been great if they worked. I am now using some industrial strength velcro to keep them from swinging when I open or close the door they hang on. I could not find any stronger hooks to order.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Not chrome, white plastic enamel over metal
customer_reviews.text: Tried hard to tell from pictures if this item was chrome or enameled white; couldn't tell. There was no indication of finish that I could find in the product description. Was disappointed to find out it was white but used it anyway. Works as advertised
customer_reviews.author: Brent Daily

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts, cheap construction
customer_reviews.text: Possibly the worst instructions ever. Parts missing, cheap construction. I do not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Vernon

customer_reviews.title: More informative On Your Product
customer_reviews.text: It Doesn’t tell you need other Components , I Had to Purchase Other Items To Help Hold It together
customer_reviews.author: VERNA CURRY

customer_reviews.title: Does what it said
customer_reviews.text: Using for storage of things that got put on bureau. Things are now sort of organized and easy to find.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and versatile.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed. Bonus feature of enough hardware to make two shorter hanging storage areas which I installed easily on both sides of the door.
customer_reviews.author: LizKauai

customer_reviews.title: I works on walls, too.
customer_reviews.text: I mounted these on the wall. In such a case, it's best to mount at least one side on a Stud.
customer_reviews.author: John K

customer_reviews.title: Works just as described
customer_reviews.text: Works great! I can finally have all my spices where I can see them. It holds more than that too
customer_reviews.author: mimom2one

customer_reviews.title: Great over the door storage
customer_reviews.text: Can’t think of anything I didn’t like. Lots of storage. It really helped me expand my pantry!
customer_reviews.author: Bella

customer_reviews.title: Bent shelving
customer_reviews.text: The metal tracking that the shelves came in was bent , so the shelves won’t sit straight.
customer_reviews.author: Riley

customer_reviews.title: Room saver
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together and put in place. Love the number of adjustable racks that came with it. Made of good materials and hold a good amount of items.Gave us plenty of extra room for our pantry selves.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Moss

customer_reviews.title: Worked exactly as I needed
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with my over the door rack, it arrived earlier than expected & as described. Was quickly & easily assembled by my teen son & installed over my pantry door & secured with the included hooks & with a few additional command hooks it doesn't budge. Easily holds & organized all my spices, condiments and miscellaneous small items that are usually hard to see or keep up with in my pantry.
customer_reviews.author: Sheena M.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: So glad I bought this! It helped to organize my pantry. Easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Cremeens

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Works well. I put spices on it and mounted it to a door. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: stan marshall

customer_reviews.title: Perfect solution for a panty extension!
customer_reviews.text: This is a sturdy shelf, very easy to put together. Was the perfect solution for additional space needed to expand our small pantry.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great storage!
customer_reviews.text: This holds all my spices and I have lots! Great to have them all in one place and alphabetized! Easy to maintain them on order. Even my husband can put them back where they belong.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Carrier

customer_reviews.title: Handy
customer_reviews.text: Installed nicely on our tall door. We loaded it to the max and love the added storage space,
customer_reviews.author: joAnne

customer_reviews.title: It is very easy to assemble and gives me more room in a small kitchen.
customer_reviews.text: This shelving unit gives me more room in the kitchen and it was easy to put together! It is very sturdy and made well!
customer_reviews.author: Janet F.

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: This came today but is missing the 2 pieces that allows for the extended racks. We need the (2) number 5 pieces in order to finish putting this together.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love it so much!!
customer_reviews.text: This pantry organizer is too awesome. I love it! I installed myself and it was very easy. I chose to go without the drilling and so far it is holding up very well. My pantry looks so organized now, I can't say enough how happy I am for buying it. Great quality as well. Price good too.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Chapman

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, looks great, and hold a lot more than I thought! Absolutely LOVE this!! I would buy this again!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Pantry door length and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I tired couple of over the door organizers. But none of them fit my pantry door length. This one fits the pantry door and easy to install and the storage space is great. Adjustable shelves.
customer_reviews.author: yamini guttikonda

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the garage
customer_reviews.text: It turned out way better than I thought. I put it on the back of the garage door and it's holding all of the cleaning supplies and cleaning bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: The strong rack and how well it hold items.
customer_reviews.text: I liked the way it hung over the door and the material is sturdy and strong. I think it will work better on a flat surface door, but other than that I am very happy with this product. I would highly recommend it to others as I posted it on Facebook. It made so space in my cabinets.
customer_reviews.author: Gaynor Hicks

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't reach top to bottom of door
customer_reviews.text: Had plenty of shelves/brackets; had to use a drill to get screw in because hole was covered too much; length didn't reach bottom of door so couldn't stabilize with bottom brackets (normal pantry door) but I used Quake putty on the ends and it works fine!
customer_reviews.author: RUBYE FEIGENBAUM

customer_reviews.title: Does the job.  Versatile...
customer_reviews.text: 4 stars because I have no complaints, if it holds up over time I will re-rate to 5. I installed on a 17-7/8 inch wide door (if the door were less wide, it would not have fit). The original plan was to install the whole thing on one door, but during unboxing, I realized it could be split into two pieces, so i used both doors. We are always looking for more storage and better organization; this worked perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Mike P

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love this! We made this our spice rack! It holds so much! Easy to install and durable !!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: useful but hard to assemble due to missing screws
customer_reviews.text: good product and useful, missing screws make it hard to assemble
customer_reviews.author: lifeisgood

customer_reviews.title: Baskets did not align to rails
customer_reviews.text: Well made and was easy to assemble to a point. Problem started when I hung it on the door. Kept leaning to one side. Previous reviews mentioned this . Baskets did not align with holes which added to the leaning problem. It holds quite a lot but it is not aligned and foresee future problems.
customer_reviews.author: Jim C

customer_reviews.title: Organised closet!
customer_reviews.text: We put this inside the door of our "cleaning" closet where all of our chemicals, light bulbs, paper products are kept. My husband put it up quick and easy. It is really nice, I like that the shelves are adjustable and it really holds a lot. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: JLynnRNmomof4DomesticGoddess

customer_reviews.title: Missing items
customer_reviews.text: Product came and was missing one of the main sections, (should have been 4 in total, came with three) that all of the shelves attach too. I was still able to use one half of the product as intended, as I had planned on using half for a spice rack, and the other for storage anyways.
customer_reviews.author: adam clark

customer_reviews.title: Great for organizing my spices
customer_reviews.text: This worked great. Easy to installed. It held all of my spices and then some. It freed up a lot of space in my pantry
customer_reviews.author: Judy P.

customer_reviews.title: Storage
customer_reviews.text: Needed additional shelving for the bathroom. Works fantastic just be sure to find a way to strap it to the door midlength or else it'll shift and products will fall.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Home-Complete Over the Door Organizer-Space Saving Hanging Storage Shelves for Kitchen, Pantry, Closet-For Spices, Jars, Cleaning Products and More
product_meta.description: The Over the Door Organizer by Home-Complete is a space saving essential for your kitchen, pantry or closet! This space saving storage rack features 8 shelves that are conveniently adjustable, as well as 3 stoppers to prevent taller items from falling out. The versatile design allows you to either utilize the organizer as one long rack, or two shorter ones. Installation is a snap, as the shelves come equipped with both over the door hooks and mount screws. These durable shelves are perfect for storing spices, jars, cleaning products, cereal boxes, soda bottles, and so much more! SATISFACTION GUARANTEED: Home-Complete is committed to providing the consumer with the absolute best price and value on all of our products, which we ensure by applying a rigorous quality control process. NOTE: This is an exclusive product of Home-Complete and ONLY Over the Door Organizer by Home-Complete are GUARANTEED to be genuine IMPORTANT: Avoid buying counterfeit products and transacting with unauthorized sellers. Look for our logo on the packaging for every one of our products. Home-Complete is a registered trademark protected by U.S. Trademark law and will be vigorously defended.
feature_bullets: SPACE-SAVING SHELVES- The over the door organizer is a space saving essential for your kitchen, pantry or closet. These durable shelves are a great way to keep your home neat and clutter free!

ADJUSTABLE- Featuring 8 shelves that are conveniently adjustable, as well as 3 stoppers to prevent taller items from falling out, this rack is perfect for storing spices, jars, cleaning products, cereal boxes, soda bottles, and so much more!

VERSATILE- The versatile design allows you to either utilize the organizer as one long rack, or two shorter ones, so it’s great for any room or space in the home; keep one in your bathroom, bedroom, garage, or linen closet!
EASY INSTALLATION- Installation is a quick and easy, as the shelves come equipped with both over the door hooks and mount screws so that you can hang them anywhere you like.
PRODUCT DETAILS- Material: Metal. Dimensions: (H)74”x (L)17.7” x (W)5.1”. Comes with door hooks and mount screws.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars817 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
